name: Hail Mary
description:
The experience of touring and not coming home for days sometimes causes anxiety. Anxiety in the person left behind or in the durability of the vehicle being used. This condition makes me always pray for all the smoothness in the journey. Prayer to ask God's blessing and parents for the safety of the long journey undertaken.

In Catholicism, the Virgin Mary is known as the Mother of Help. The appropriation of the figure of the Virgin Mary who is embracing the author's machine is used as a symbol of the mother, helper and protector of the journey she is going through.
